title: [TOMT][toy] Straw attached to plastic bottle with yarn loop ... - Reddit
body: When I was a kid, we did these walkathons at school and we got prizes for high performance. One of the prizes was this toy that was a hard plastic straw that ended in a small (maybe two inches tall) plastic coke bottle. The bottle was hollow and threaded through it was a string of yarn tied in a loop. When you blow into the straw, it makes the ...
